goal_descEN: Ensure sustainable consumption and production patterns
target_descEN: By 2030, halve per capita global food waste at the retail and consumer levels and reduce food losses along production and supply chains, including post-harvest losses
indicator_descEN: (a) Food loss index and (b) food waste index
